Key Match Events: The Chicago Bulls won 138-105 over the Washington Wizards.
Zach LaVine scored 33 points on 14-21 shooting.
Zach LaVine has scored 30+ points in five consecutive games.
Post-Match Reflections: Lonzo Ball praised Zach LaVine, calling him the best shooting guard he has ever played with.
Lonzo Ball expressed his privilege to play with Zach LaVine and his readiness to compete alongside him against any team.
